EmailTemplate.subject: Save now 50% on your upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View in browser <[[#]]> REPLACE NOW and SAVE 50% EXTENDED OFFER VALID THROUGH END OF DECEMBER 2016 Return your MKV unit in serviceable condition and we provide the new MKV-A unit with USB drive for 50% discount off price list. <[[#]]> FIND OUT MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/MKV-A EGPWS Customer Information v7.pdf]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/EGPWS BOTTOM.JPG]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://honeywell.com/privacy/pages/en.aspx]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]>
